8. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8. 安全考虑

contents.text: Subscriptions to conference state information can reveal very sensitive information. For this reason, it is RECOMMENDED that a focus use a strong means for authentication and conference information protection and that it apply comprehensive authorization rules when using the conference notification mechanism defined in this document. The following sections will discuss each of these aspects in more detail.
contents.zh-CHS: 订阅会议状态信息可能会泄露非常敏感的信息。因此，建议focus使用强大的身份验证和会议信息保护手段，并在使用本文件中定义的会议通知机制时应用全面的授权规则。以下各节将更详细地讨论这些方面。

contents.text: 8.1. Connection Security
contents.zh-CHS: 8.1. 连接安全

contents.text: It is RECOMMENDED that a focus authenticate a conference package subscriber using the normal SIP authentication mechanisms, such as Digest as defined in Section 22 of RFC 3261 [8].
contents.zh-CHS: 建议focus使用常规SIP认证机制（如RFC 3261[8]第22节中定义的摘要）对会议包订户进行认证。

contents.text: The mechanism used for conveying the conference information MUST ensure integrity and SHOULD ensure confidentially of the information. In order to achieve these, an end-to-end SIP encryption mechanism,
contents.zh-CHS: 用于传达会议信息的机制必须确保完整性，并应确保信息的机密性。为了实现这些，一种端到端SIP加密机制，

contents.text: such as S/MIME described in Section 26.2.4 of RFC 3261 [8], SHOULD be used.
contents.zh-CHS: 应使用RFC 3261[8]第26.2.4节中描述的S/MIME。

contents.text: If a strong end-to-end security means (such as above) is not available, it is RECOMMENDED that a focus use mutual hop-by-hop Transport Layer Security (TLS) authentication and encryption mechanisms described in Section 26.2.2 "SIPS URI Scheme" and Section 26.3.2.2 "Interdomain Requests" of RFC 3261 [8].
contents.zh-CHS: 如果没有强大的端到端安全手段（如上文所述），建议focus使用RFC 3261[8]第26.2.2节“SIPS URI方案”和第26.3.2.2节“域间请求”中描述的相互逐跳传输层安全（TLS）认证和加密机制。

contents.text: 8.2. Authorization Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 8.2. 授权注意事项

contents.text: Generally speaking, conference applications are very concerned about authorization decisions. Mechanisms for establishing and enforcing such authorization rules are a central concept throughout the SIP Conferencing Framework [16]. Because most of the information about a conference can be presented using the conference package, many of the authorization rules directly apply to this specification. As a result, a notification server MUST be capable of generating distinct conference information views to different subscribers, subject to a subscriber's role in a conference, personal access rights, etc. - all subject to local authorization policies and rules.
contents.zh-CHS: 一般来说，会议应用程序非常关注授权决策。建立和实施此类授权规则的机制是整个SIP会议框架的核心概念[16]。由于有关会议的大多数信息都可以使用会议包呈现，因此许多授权规则直接应用于此规范。因此，通知服务器必须能够根据订阅者在会议中的角色、个人访问权限等，为不同订阅者生成不同的会议信息视图，所有这些都必须遵守本地授权策略和规则。

contents.text: Since a focus provides participant identity information using this event package, participant privacy needs to be taken into account. A focus MUST support requests by participants for privacy. Privacy can be indicated by the conference policy - for every participant or select participants. It can also be indicated in the session signaling. In SIP, this can be done using the Privacy header field described in RFC 3323 [11]. For a participant requesting privacy, no identity information SHOULD be revealed by the focus in any included URI (e.g., the Address of Record, Contact, or GRUU). For these cases, the anonymous URI generation method outlined in Section 5.6 of this document MUST be followed.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于focus使用此事件包提供参与者身份信息，因此需要考虑参与者隐私。焦点必须支持参与者的隐私请求。隐私可以通过会议政策来表示-对于每个参与者或选定的参与者。它也可以在会话信令中指示。在SIP中，这可以使用RFC 3323[11]中描述的隐私头字段来完成。对于请求隐私的参与者，焦点不应在任何包含的URI（例如记录地址、联系人或GRUU）中透露身份信息。对于这些情况，必须遵循本文档第5.6节中概述的匿名URI生成方法。

contents.text: 9. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 9. IANA考虑

contents.text: This document registers a SIP event package, a new MIME type, application/conference-info+xml, a new XML namespace, and a new XML schema, and creates a sub-registry "URI purposes" under the existing registry: http://www.iana.org/assignments/sip-parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档注册一个SIP事件包、一个新的MIME类型、应用程序/会议信息+xml、一个新的xml命名空间和一个新的xml模式，并在现有注册表下创建一个子注册表“URI用途”：http://www.iana.org/assignments/sip-parameters.

contents.text: 9.1. conference Event Package Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 9.1. 会议活动套餐注册

contents.text: This specification registers an event package, based on the registration procedures defined in RFC 3265 [10]. The following is the information required for such a registration:
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范根据RFC 3265[10]中定义的注册过程注册事件包。以下是此类注册所需的信息：

contents.text: Package Name: conference
contents.zh-CHS: 包裹名称：会议

contents.text: Package or Template-Package: This is a package.
contents.zh-CHS: 包或模板包：这是一个包。

contents.text: Published Document: RFC 4575
contents.zh-CHS: 出版文件：RFC 4575

contents.text:
Person to Contact:  IETF SIPPING Working Group <sipping@ietf.org>, as
   designated by the IESG <iesg@ietf.org>
9.2. application/conference-info+xml MIME Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 9.2. 应用程序/会议信息+xml MIME注册

contents.text: MIME media type name: application
contents.zh-CHS: MIME媒体类型名称：应用程序

contents.text: MIME subtype name: conference-info+xml
contents.zh-CHS: MIME子类型名称：会议信息+xml

contents.text: Mandatory parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 强制参数：无

contents.text: Optional parameters: Same as charset parameter application/xml as specified in RFC 3023 [7]
contents.zh-CHS: 可选参数：与RFC 3023[7]中指定的字符集参数application/xml相同

contents.text: Encoding considerations: Same as encoding considerations of application/xml as specified in RFC 3023 [7]
contents.zh-CHS: 编码注意事项：与RFC 3023[7]中指定的应用程序/xml的编码注意事项相同

contents.text: Security considerations: See Section 10 of RFC 3023 [7] and Section 8 of this specification
contents.zh-CHS: 安全注意事项：参见RFC 3023[7]第10节和本规范第8节

contents.text: Interoperability considerations: none
contents.zh-CHS: 互操作性注意事项：无

contents.text: Published specification: This document
contents.zh-CHS: 已发布规范：本文件

contents.text: Applications which use this media type: This document type has been used to support SIP conferencing applications
contents.zh-CHS: 使用此媒体类型的应用程序：此文档类型已用于支持SIP会议应用程序

contents.text: Additional Information:
contents.zh-CHS: 其他信息：

contents.text: Magic Number: None
contents.zh-CHS: 神奇数字：无

contents.text: File Extension: .xml
contents.zh-CHS: 文件扩展名：.xml

contents.text: Macintosh file type code: "TEXT"
contents.zh-CHS: Macintosh文件类型代码：“文本”

contents.text:
Personal and email address for further information:  IETF SIPPING
   Working Group <sipping@ietf.org>, as designated by the IESG
   <iesg@ietf.org>
Intended usage: COMMON
contents.zh-CHS: 预期用途：普通

contents.text:

   <sipping@ietf.org>, as designated by the IESG <iesg@ietf.org>

9.3.  URN Sub-Namespace Registration for
      urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:conference-info
This section registers a new XML namespace, as per the guidelines in RFC 3688 [21].

contents.text:

XML:
contents.zh-CHS: XML:

9.4. XML Schema Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 9.4. XML模式注册

contents.text: This specification registers a schema, as per the guidelines in RFC 3688 [21].
contents.zh-CHS: 根据RFC 3688[21]中的指南，本规范注册了一个模式。

contents.text: URI: please assign
contents.zh-CHS: URI:请指定

contents.text:
Registrant Contact: IETF SIPPING Working Group <sipping@ietf.org>,
as designated by the IESG <iesg@ietf.org>
XML: The XML can be found as the sole content of Section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: XML：XML是第6节的唯一内容。

contents.text: 9.5. URI Purposes Sub-registry Establishment
contents.zh-CHS: 9.5. 注册分处的设立

contents.text: The IANA has created a new sub-registry, "URI purposes", under the already existing registry: http://www.iana.org/assignments/sip-parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已在现有注册表下创建了一个新的子注册表“URI用途”：http://www.iana.org/assignments/sip-parameters.

contents.text: The purpose of a URI is an XML element, encoded in the conference event package RFC 4575. The value of the <purpose> element indicates the intended usage of the URI in the context of the conference event package and is defined in Sections 5.3.1 and 5.3.2 of this specification.
contents.zh-CHS: URI的用途是XML元素，编码在会议事件包RFC4575中。<purpose>元素的值表示URI在会议事件包上下文中的预期用途，并在本规范第5.3.1节和第5.3.2节中定义。

contents.text: This sub-registry is defined as a table that contains the following three columns:
contents.zh-CHS: 此子注册表定义为包含以下三列的表：

contents.text: Value: The token under registration
contents.zh-CHS: 值：正在注册的令牌

contents.text: Description: A descriptive text defining the intended usage of the URI
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：定义URI预期用途的描述性文本

contents.text: Document: A reference to the document defining the registration
contents.zh-CHS: 文档：对定义注册的文档的引用

contents.text: The IANA has created the table with the initial content as defined below:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA已创建具有以下初始内容的表：

contents.text: participation The URI can be used to join the [RFC 4575] conference
contents.zh-CHS: 参与URI可用于加入[RFC 4575]会议

contents.text: streaming The URI can be used to access the [RFC 4575] streamed conference data
contents.zh-CHS: 流式传输URI可用于访问[RFC 4575]流式会议数据

contents.text: event The URI can be used to subscribe [RFC 4575] to the conference event package
contents.zh-CHS: 事件URI可用于订阅[RFC 4575]会议事件包

contents.text: recording The URI can be used to access the [RFC 4575] recorded conference data
contents.zh-CHS: 记录URI可用于访问[RFC 4575]记录的会议数据

contents.text: web-page The URI can be used to access a [RFC 4575] web page that contains additional information of the conference
contents.zh-CHS: 网页URI可用于访问包含会议附加信息的[RFC 4575]网页

contents.text: New values of the "URI purposes" are registered by the IANA and are specification required according to the definition of RFC 2434 [4]. The IANA Considerations section of the specification MUST include the following information:
contents.zh-CHS: IANA注册了“URI用途”的新值，根据RFC 2434[4]的定义，这些值是规范要求的。规范的IANA注意事项部分必须包括以下信息：

contents.text: Value:  The value of the <purpose> element to be registered
Description: A short description of the intended usage of the URI
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：URI预期用途的简短描述
